00063 
00088 class EGS_GAUSSIAN_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_GaussianShape : public EGS_BaseShape {
00089 
00090 public:
00091 
00092     EGS_GaussianShape(EGS_BaseShape *Shape, EGS_Float sx, EGS_Float sy,
00093                       EGS_Float sz, const string &Name="",EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00094         EGS_BaseShape(Name,f), shape(Shape), sig_x(sx), sig_y(sy), sig_z(sz) {
00095         if (shape) {
00096             shape->ref();
00097             otype = shape->getObjectType();
00098             otype += "with Gaussian ditribution";
00099             if (sig_x < 0) {
00100                 sig_x = -sig_x*0.4246609;
00101             }
00102             if (sig_y < 0) {
00103                 sig_y = -sig_y*0.4246609;
00104             }
00105             if (sig_z < 0) {
00106                 sig_z = -sig_z*0.4246609;
00107             }
00108         }
00109         else {
00110             otype = "Invalid GaussianShape";
00111         }
00112     };
00113     ~EGS_GaussianShape() {
00114         EGS_Object::deleteObject(shape);
00115     };
00116     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00117         EGS_Vector v(shape->getPoint(rndm));
00118         if (sig_x > 0) {
00119             v.x += sig_x*rndm->getGaussian();
00120         }
00121         if (sig_y > 0) {
00122             v.y += sig_y*rndm->getGaussian();
00123         }
00124         if (sig_z > 0) {
00125             v.z += sig_z*rndm->getGaussian();
00126         }
00127         return v;
00128     };
00129     bool supportsDirectionMethod() const {
00130         return true;
00131     };
00132     void getPointSourceDirection(const EGS_Vector &Xo,
00133                                  EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm, EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &wt) {
00134         EGS_Vector xo = T ? Xo*(*T) : Xo;
00135         EGS_Vector x = getPoint(rndm);
00136         u = x - xo;
00137         EGS_Float d2i = 1/u.length2(), di = sqrt(d2i);
00138         u *= di;
00139         wt = 1; //wt = A*fabs(u.z)*d2i;
00140         if (T) {
00141             T->rotate(u);
00142         }
00143     };
00144 
00145 protected:
00146 
00147     EGS_BaseShape  *shape;
00148     EGS_Float      sig_x, sig_y, sig_z;
00149 
00150 };
00151 
00152 #endif
